attributes.action: Rooms For Refugees - Allow our Ukrainian Counterparts Sanctuary in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
The Ukrainian people are currently being slaughtered without prejudice.

Forced out of their jobs, homes and country, we should share the burden of Putin's war with the rest of Europe.

The pressures on our Eastern counterparts are only going to get harder to shoulder as this crisis continues, it is time we matched the efforts of our allies and provide sanctuary to those whose lives have been torn apart.
attributes.background: We are seeking that the government allow the Ukrainian refugees through the borders without delay and into the arms of the welcoming British public

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Waive visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382

Implement arrangements to enable English households to sponsor Ukraine refugees
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610542

Commit to providing refuge for at least 100,000 Ukrainian women & children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609565

Draw up and implement a specific Ukrainian refugee strategy for the UK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609431
